content: Jesus asked a question to a religious law expert.
The man was walking between Jerusalem and Jericho.
The first person to see the man in need was a samaritan.
The Good Samaritan used oil to treat the man.
The Good Samaritan place the man an his own animal.
The Good Samaritan took the man in need to a hospital.
Jesus said at the end of parable to go and do likewise.
